mapper.select: select COUPON_IDX as couponIdx, COUPON_TITLE as couponTitle, COUPON_RATE as couponRate, COUPON_IMG as couponImg, COUPON_START as couponStart, COUPON_END as couponEnd, COUPON_STATE as couponState from coupon_list

select cl.COUPON_IDX as couponIdx, cl.COUPON_TITLE as couponTitle, cl.COUPON_RATE as couponRate, cl.COUPON_IMG as couponImg, cl.COUPON_START as couponStart, cl.COUPON_END as couponEnd, cl.COUPON_STATE as couponState from coupon_list cl, coupon_record cr where cr.U_IDX = #{uIdx}
AND cr.COUPON_USE_STATE = 0
AND cr.COUPON_USE_STATE != 0
and cr.COUPON_IDX = cl.COUPON_IDX
